org.dejava.component.i18n.message.handler.impl

Class SimpleMessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dejava.component.i18n.message.handler.impl.SimpleMessageHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MessageHandler

    public class SimpleMessageHandler
extends Object
implements MessageHandler
    Default i18n message handler. Handles getting messages from within a class using the information provided by the annotations MessageBundle. Uses the default Java i18n API. It works by searching the localized message bundle information at runtime (via annotations). If the localized message (with this internationalization handler) cannot be found with the information of the given type, it keeps looking in the super classes (and interfaces) until the localized message is found. Enjoy Java i18n and l10n!
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage(Class<?> type,
                Locale locale,
                String key,
                Object[] parametersValues)
                  throws MessageNotFoundException,
                         org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Gets a localized message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the message. Must be annotated with MessageBundle.
        locale - Locale for the message. If no locale is provided, the message handler locale is used.
        key - Key for the localized message in the bundle.
        parametersValues - Parameter values for the message.
        Returns:
        A localized message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.
        Throws:
        MessageNotFoundException - If the localized message cannot be found.
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If any of the parameters values are not valid.

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage(Object type,
                Locale locale,
                String key,
                Object[] parametersValues)
                  throws MessageNotFoundException,
                         org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Description copied from interface: MessageHandler
        Gets a message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.
        Specified by:
        getMessage in interface MessageHandler
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the message (containing the bundle information).
        locale - Locale for the message.
        key - Key for the message in the bundle.
        parametersValues - Parameter values for the message.
        Returns:
        A message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.
        Throws:
        MessageNotFoundException - If the message cannot be found.
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If any of the parameters values are not valid.
        See Also:
        MessageHandler.getMessage(java.lang.Object, java.util.Locale, java.lang.String, java.lang.Object[])
